import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import BackTotop from './back_to_top' import Footer from './footer' import Navbar from './navbar' import TrendingCourses from './trending_courses' const Cart = () => { const [cart, Setcart] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { let cart = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart')) if (cart) { Setcart(cart) } }, []) const deleteItem = (index) =>{ const newCart = [...cart] newArray.splice(i, 1); setSectionArray(newVar) let newForm = formikPersist newForm.values.sections = newVar localStorage.setItem('course', JSON.stringify(newForm)) } return ( <>
{cart.length ? '' :
Your Cart is empty
}
{cart.map((item, index) => { return ( <> Your Shopping Cart

deleteItem(index)}>
) })} {cart.length ? : ''}
) } export default Cart
